# repeatDuration

**Instance Property**

Determines how many seconds the animation will repeat for.

## Declaration

```swift
var repeatDuration: CFTimeInterval { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to 0. If the `repeatDuration` is 0, it is ignored. If both [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMediaTiming/repeatDuration] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMediaTiming/repeatCount] are specified the behavior is undefined.

## Repeating Animations

- **repeatCount**: Determines the number of times the animation will repeat.
